emailTemplate.subject: ${senderDisplayName} has just posted to their profile wall on ${localSakaiName}
emailTemplate.htmlMessage:
${senderDisplayName} has just posted to their profile wall on ${localSakaiName}

To view their profile, follow the url below:
${profileLink}

---
This automatic notification message was sent by ${localSakaiName} (${localSakaiUrl})
Control what email notifications you receive from connections at My Workspace > ${toolName} > Preferences
